question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the general distribution of temperature?
  1. The mean annual temperature tends to fall towards the poles.
  2. The highest as well as the lowest temperatures are recorded in the interiors of continents.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The highest absolute temperatures are observed near the tropics in the interiors of the continents.
The mean annual temperature tends to fall towards the poles. The polar regions have the lowest annual temperatures.Â 
Due to continental influence, the highest as well as the lowest temperatures are recorded in the interiors of continents.
